doc:
Tom London https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Tom_London 0 Tom London (born Leonard Clapham, August 24, 1889 – December 5, 1963) was an American veteran actor who played frequently in B-Westerns. According to The Guinness Book of Movie Records, London is credited with appearing in the most films in the history of Hollywood, this according to the 2001 book Film Facts, where it states that the performer who played in the most films was "Tom London, who made his first of over 2000 appearances in The Great Train Robbery, 1903. Tom_London ( born Leonard_Clapham , August_24_,_1889 – December_5_,_1963 ) was an_American_veteran_actor who played frequently in B-Westerns . According to The_Guinness_Book of Movie_Records , London is_credited with appearing in the_most_films in the_history of Hollywood , this_according to the_2001_book_Film_Facts , where it states that the_performer who played in the_most_films was " Tom_London , who made his_first of over_2000_appearances in The_Great_Train_Robbery , 1903 .
